title: Dinnerbone:由C418制作的新音乐/音效已经启用
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 a20001017 于 2013-11-17 09:30 编辑 

Dinnerbone:If you restart Minecraft, it'll become a whole bunch more awesome thanks to @C418's latest works :)
Dinnerbone:如果你重启了Minecraft，它就会更加更加棒了，你得感谢C418最近的工作！

解读：似乎比预想中的要快哦
